snippet.title: Wartales | The Pits | OUT NOW!
snippet.description:
Dive into the black markets where the wealthiest brigands in the Five Kingdoms hold secret battles. Fight for reputation, lucrative rewards and exclusive items in these clandestine arenas. Prepare for 25 meticulously designed tactical battles that will test your mastery of Wartales. These black markets are not just battlegrounds, they're your gateway to wealth and prestige.

Buy now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3112270/Wartales__The_Pits/
